channel.title: VA-DC MMINDI Reunion 2017
channel.description: MMINDI Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Weekend, July 13-17 site information, etc.

item.title: Announcement MMINDI VA-DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Event
item.description:
Updated: May 28th, 2017:

To be held in Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC, on July 13-17...

TOTAL REWRITE! :-)

PLEASE TAKE A MINUTE TO READ and PASS IT ON!

OLD and NEW FRIENDS making MEMORIES

We have made some changes to our VA/DC Reunion in July 2017.

No Registration fee. No “formal” commitment - however, we would like to know if you are interesting in joining us – see Reunion website and register just to let us know you may be coming.

note Hotel Accommodations block only available at great price $169/nite until June 15th!

We would still like to go with the planned organization of the weekend as previously shared; however, it will be “pay as you go.” This means, if you think you might find yourself in the VA/DC area July 13-17 – you can meet up with us wherever we find ourselves.

This “Reunion Website” is being updated to reflect this information. Please let classmates know our new plan. We will be creating a closed Facebook page for those who will be coming to VA/DC in July so that we can share plans and ideas with each other.

We will be RETURNING all money to those that have paid anything towards the reunion. It will be returned via PayPal if this is how you paid. Those who have sent checks should have been contacted as well.

item.title: Registration
item.description:
Register if you know you're coming, but no payment commitment.

This will let us know to add you to the Facebook group if you're not already in it (closed group Lisa created).
 


No Hub House


The Registration Form is open for the VA-DC 2017 MMINDI "Birthday" Reunion. You can click on it here or on the link on the left side. You can see who has registered (i.e. plans to come) on Who Is Coming List.


Registration Details:

  • Submitting this registration will email us your information so that we can contact you to be "in-the-know" with and any all plans that Lisa Thackston is working on.

  • Note: Lisa will be refunding all deposits and payments to date, she's working on that now after getting back her deposits from events she had scheduled.

Any issues or questions email us @MMINDIConnect or to @Lisa Thackston.

item.title: Who-Is-Coming
item.description: The Who Is Coming? page up HERE. If you're planning to come but haven't registered, get on it! Lisa will work out the payment with you for registration and if you've made a deposit deduct it from that.

item.title: Accommodations
item.description:
Accommodations

The reunion has set a block of space at Hotel block: http://www.lorienhotelandspa.com with a link for reservation here for making the reservation online or you can use the phone number info below and say you want the "MMI/NDI Reunion" block.

The hotel is $169/night - they have a wine and cheese thing each evening and are a pet friendly hotel. You can request a pet-free/allergy-free room if needed at booking time. They have fitness 24 hours center, etc. Check out their FAQ. - John Q

Note: See addition details below from the hotel:

  • We offer valet (parking) only, which is $30 a night and allows as much in/out as your guest may need for no additional charge.
  • We offer complimentary wireless throughout the hotel as long as you are Kimpton Karma Member, which is in the link here. This will also give the chance to customize your stay (selecting pillow preferences, newspaper, and tons of other fun stuff!) and also gives you a $10 Raid the Mini Bar card. *note: $12.99 internet fee/24 hours for non-rewards members-JohnQ*
  • The reservations department is available 24 hours a day at 1-877-956-7436. All reservations should be made under the “MMI/NDI Reunion” in order to receive the group rate.

Again, the booking link is here and you can review the Kimpton Hotels Karma Rewards program here.

NOTE: Kimpton Lorien Hotel & Spa block deadline is June 15th.

Block rate: The price of the rooms are *$169.00 until the block is released and then whatever market rate is at the resort.

Oh yea - you can see the walk from Hotel -> Metro:

item.title: Draft Agenda
item.description:
The Registration Link is Up! Go get registered! Updated agenda below.

*subject to change - Updated May 28th, 2017

Tentative Schedule

Additional Details added as it happens.

Contact List with Lisa lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com. to make sure you're on the facebook page group where posts will be made about events.

There are no upfront costs now, it will be pay as you go depending on the events scheduled as we figure things out.

  • Anyone interested in helping with the planning, organizing, set-up, etc. please contact Lisa Thackston at lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com.

  • FYI
    -- deposits/registration fees paid will be refunded

Tentative Timeline Breakdown

Thursday, July 13th

  • Nothing planned ATM. Pending informal get together.

  • Hotel: Accomodations Still Here! this is block of rooms within walking distance of the Metro. Deadline is June 15 for this great price and location in Old Alexandria.

Friday, July 14th
  • Planning Event Pending an evening get together, wine and stuff?
Saturday, July 15th
  • Planning Event Pending - still may go to restaurant but as a small group without reserving a large room/event. I.e. Still possible Dinner at local Landini Brothers Italian Restaurant
Sunday, July 16th
  • Planning Event Pending - Looking for someone who is close by who might be willing to host their location for a BBQ. Contact Lisa if so!
Monday, July 17th
  • Still thinking of getting together for some kind a breakfast/farewell but - planning pending. Anyone have suggestions for a good place to do this?
